
<p class=box>
[UPRESS](#upress) = internal UHSAS pressure [kPa]\index{UPRESS}  
[USMPFLW](#pflw) = measured volumetric sample flow [cm$^{3}$min$^{-1}$]  
[PFLW](#pflw) = sample mass flow referenced to standard conditions [cm$^{3}$min$^{-1}$]  
$T_{blk}$ = UHSAS optical block temperature, 305 K  
$p_{std}$ = standard pressure, 1013.25 hPa  
$T_{std}$ = standard temperature, 298.15 K\index{UHSAS!STP}  
[PSXC](./4-the-state-of-the-atmosphere.html#psx) = corrected ambient pressure [hPa]  
[ATX](./4-the-state-of-the-atmosphere.html#ambient-t) = ambient temperature [$^{\circ}$C]  
$T_{0}$ = 273.15\ K  
</p><p class=box2>  
\begin{equation}
\mathrm{\{PFLWC\}}=\frac{\mathrm{\{PFLW\}}}{60}\frac{p_{std}}{\mathrm{\{PSXC\}}}\frac{(\mathrm{\{ATX\}}+T_{0})}{T_{std}}  
(\#eq:PFLWCbox1)
\end{equation}
\begin{equation}
\mathrm{\{USFLWC\}}=\frac{\mathrm{\{USMPFLW\}}}{60}\frac{(\mathrm{\{UPRESS\}\times 10})} {\mathrm{\{PSXC\}}}\frac{\mathrm{(\{ATX\}}+T_{0})}{T_{blk}}  
(\#eq:PFLWCbox2)
\end{equation}
</p>
